categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Grimey" was a diminutive individual who lived on the desert planet of Tatooine around the time of the Naboo Crisis in 32 BBY. That year, he was seen roaming the streets of Mos Espa shortly before the Boonta Eve Classic.

"Grimey" was the on-stage nickname given to one of the four characters played by Warwick Davis in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the other three being Wald, Weazel, and, briefly, a walking Yoda.
